panels.title: Cluster (Global)
On Demand Instance Type
Spot Instance Type
Total Daily Cluster Cost
Idle Daily Cluster Cost

targets.expr:
sum_over_time(
  sum (
  
      # See description for label_replace
      label_replace(
        zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
        OR
        capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
      , "resource", "CPU", "","")
      
      OR 
      
      label_replace(
        zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
        OR
        capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost
      , "resource", "memory", "","")

)
[1d:1h])

panels.title: Usage Daily Cluster Cost
Shared Daily Cluster Cost

targets.expr:
sum_over_time(
  sum (
  
      # See description for label_replace
      label_replace(
          ((
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
              - 
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
          OR
          ((
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost
              -
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
      , "resource", "CPU", "","")
      
      OR 
      
      label_replace(
          ((
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
              -
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
          OR
          ((
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
              -
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
          ) > 0)
      , "resource", "memory", "","")

)
[1d:1h])

panels.title: Underutilization Daily Cluster Cost
Total Monthly PV Cost
Daily Cluster Cost per Instance Type and Capacity Type
Daily Cluster Cost per Instance and Capacity Type

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) (
    sum_over_time(
      (
        zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:spot_idle_cpu_cost
        OR
        capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_idle_cpu_cost
        OR
        zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:spot_idle_mem_cost
        OR
        capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:on_demand_idle_mem_cost
      )
    [1d:1h])
)
)

panels.title: Daily Idle Cost per Instance Type and Capacity Type

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) (
  sum_over_time(
    (
      zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:spot_idle_cpu_cost
      OR
      capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_idle_cpu_cost
      OR
      zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:spot_idle_mem_cost
      OR
      capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:on_demand_idle_mem_cost
    )
  [1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily Idle Cost per Instance and Capacity Type

targets.expr:
sort_desc (
  sum_over_time(
      sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) (
      
	      # See description for label_replace
	      label_replace(
	          ((
	              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
	              - 
	              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
	          ) > 0)
	          OR
	          ((
	              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost
	              -
	              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
	          ) > 0)
	      , "resource", "CPU", "","")
	      
	      OR 
	      
	      label_replace(
	          ((
	              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
	              -
	              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
	          ) > 0)
	          OR
	          ((
	              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
	              -
	              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
	          ) > 0)
	      , "resource", "memory", "","")

    )
  [1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily Underutilization Cost per Instance Type and Capacity Type

panels.description:
label_replace is used to ALWAYS have a different label (resource) when doing OR, so that no time series is filtered by binary operations (capacity_type for internal OR, resource for external OR)

If for example a pod has CPU requests but not memory requests, the binary sum (+) will filter the CPU sum (won't count for them)

targets.expr:
sum_over_time(
  sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) (
  
      # See description for label_replace
      label_replace(
          ((
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
              - 
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
          OR
          ((
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost
              -
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
      , "resource", "CPU", "","")
      
      OR 
      
      label_replace(
          ((
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
              -
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost

              -

)
[1d:1h])

panels.title: Daily Underutilization Cost per Instance Type and Capacity Type

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) (
    sum_over_time(
      (
            zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_cpu_price:spot_shared_cpu_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_shared_cpu_cost
            OR
            zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_mem_price:spot_shared_mem_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_mem_price:on_demand_shared_mem_cost
      )
    [1d:1h])
  )
)

  sum_over_time(
    (
          zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_cpu_price:spot_shared_cpu_cost
          OR
          capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_shared_cpu_cost

panels.title: Daily Shared Cost per Instance and Capacity Type

panels.description:
label_replace is used to ALWAYS have a different label (resource) when doing OR, so that no time series is filtered by binary operations (capacity_type for internal OR, resource for external OR)

If for example a pod has CPU requests but not memory requests, the binary sum (+) will filter the CPU sum (won't count for them)

targets.expr:
sum_over_time(
    sum by (namespace) (
        # See description for label_replace
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost
        , "resource", "CPU", "","")
        
        OR 
        
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
        , "resource", "memory", "","")

	)
[1d:1h])

        # See description for label_replace

		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
        , "resource", "CPU", "","")
        
        OR 
        
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost
        , "resource", "memory", "","")

	)
[1d:1h])

panels.title: Daily Usage Cost per Namespace
Daily Resources Requests Memory Cost per Namespace
Daily Memory Usage Cost per Namespace
Daily Resources Requests CPU Cost per Namespace
Daily CPU Usage Cost per Namespace
Monthly PVCs Cost
Monthly PVCs Cost
Cluster (Namespace)

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (
  sum by (node) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace="$namespace"}) 
  * on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
  sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"}) 
)

panels.title: CPU Usage Per Instance

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (
	sum by (node) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", name!=""})
	* on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
	sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"})
)

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, pod) (
    sum by (pod, node) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace=~"$namespace"})
    * on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
    sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"})
)

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, pod) (
  sum by (pod, node) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", name!=""})
  * on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
  sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"})
)
